PerfectNetExp.abs: ①stayathome呆家里gooutwith出去了／　与某人交往

entry.tran: (不去工作或旅行)守在家里的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a stay-at-home, you mean that they stay at home rather than going out to work or travelling.

example.ex: I was a stay-at-home mum until 1980 when my husband lost his job.
example.tran: 1980 年我丈夫失业之前，我一直是个家庭主妇。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
